v.v: This is also what Yahweh says:
When I came to you to rescue you,
I cause the sky to become dark,
Yahweh our God has taught me to speak for him,
Yahweh our God has spoken to me,
I allowed people to beat me on my back
But because the Lord Yahweh helps me,
God is near to me; he will show others that I have been right to trust him,
The Lord Yahweh defends me in court,
If you honor Yahweh
But you people who oppose me by lighting your own fires,
Yahweh says, “You people who desire to act righteously,
Think about your ancestor Abraham and his wife Sarah, of whom all of you are descendants.
Some day I, Yahweh, will encourage Abraham’s descendants again,
My people of Judah, listen carefully to me,
I will soon rescue you and them;
Look up at the sky,
You people who know what things are right to do,
because some day they will be destroyed
Yahweh, wake up and do something for us!
Surely you are the one who dried up the sea,
And those whom Yahweh will rescue from being exiled in Babylonia
Yahweh says,
You should not have forgotten me, Yahweh, the one who created your nation,
Soon you people, whom your enemies have caused to be slaves in Babylonia, will be freed!
because I am Yahweh, your God,
I have given you my message to proclaim,
You people of Jerusalem, wake up!
Now you do not have any children
You have experienced these disasters:
Your children have fainted and lie at the corner of every street;
So now, you people who have suffered much,
Yahweh, your Lord and your God,
Instead, I will cause those who have tormented you to suffer;
You people who live in the holy city of Jerusalem, wake up!
People of Jerusalem, get up from where you have been sitting in the dust,

v: “You Israelite people, do not think that I forced your parents to be exiled to Babylonia
like some men send away their wives
after giving them a paper
on which they state that they were divorcing them!
I certainly did not get rid of you like a man who sells his children to get money to pay what he owes.
No, the reason that I forced you to be exiled
was to punish you because of the sins that you have committed.
why did no one answer when I called out to you?
Was there no one there to buy you back and take you home?
Did you think that I do not have the power to rescue you?
Think about this:
I can speak to a sea and cause it to become dry!
I can cause rivers to become deserts
with the result that the fish in the rivers die from thirst and rot.
as though it was wearing black clothes because it was mourning because someone had died.”
in order that I may encourage those who are weary.
Each morning he awakens me,
in order that I may listen to what he teaches me.
and I have not rejected what he told me;
I have accepted it.
and to pull out the whiskers in my beard because they hated me.
I did not turn away from them
when they made fun of me and spat on me.
I will never be humiliated.
Therefore I am determined to face difficulties,
and I know that nothing will cause me to be ashamed.
so if anyone stands in front of me and accuses me in a court,
he will not be able to show that I have done anything that is wrong.
so no one will be able to condemn me.
All those who accuse me will disappear
like old clothes that have been eaten by moths.
and do what his servant tells you to do,
even if you are walking in darkness, and it seems that there is no light,
trust in Yahweh your God to help you; depend on him.
and by carrying your own flaming torches:
go ahead and live according to your own knowledge,
according to what you think is best.
Yahweh tells you what will happen to you:
he will make you die in great torment!
